actions.text: Motion by Senator Frist to reconsider the vote (Roll Call No. 94) by which amendment SA 413 was not agreed to was withdrawn in Senate.
Motion by Senator Frist to reconsider the vote (Roll Call No. 94) by which amendment SA 413 was not agreed to entered in Senate.
Amendment SA 413 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 94.
Amendment SA 413 proposed by Senator Bunning. (consideration:  CR S4356-4357) To repeal a 1993 tax increase on Social Security benefits.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 413 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 94.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 413 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 94.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 413 proposed by Senator Bunning.

purpose: To repeal a 1993 tax increase on Social Security benefits.
